info.name: GAIF 2026 API Collection
info.description: Complete API collection for GAIF 2026 Conference Registration System with full examples

variable.description: Temporary token for MFA verification during login

request.description: Register a new user account

exec: console.log('MFA Required - Use MFA Verify Login endpoint');

request.description: Login with email and password. If MFA is enabled, returns mfaRequired: true with tempToken.

response.name: MFA Required

request.description: Refresh access token using refresh token
Request password reset code via email
Verify password reset code
Generate QR code for Google Authenticator setup. Scan the QR code with your authenticator app.

response.name: Success

request.description: Verify the 6-digit code from Google Authenticator to enable MFA
Complete login with MFA verification using tempToken from login response
Disable MFA - requires current MFA code for verification
Check if MFA is enabled for the authenticated user

item.name: User Management
item.description: User CRUD APIs - Only ADMINISTRATOR and GAIF_ADMIN can access

request.description: Create a new user. Email must be unique. Roles: ADMINISTRATOR, GAIF_ADMIN, REGISTRATION_ADMIN, USER
Get paginated list of users with optional filters

response.name: Success
response.body:
{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "email": "admin@gaif.com",
      "fullName": "Admin User",
      "mobile": "+962791111111",
      "role": "ADMINISTRATOR",
      "status": "APPROVED",
      "isActive": true,
      "mfaEnabled": true,
      "createdAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00.000Z"
    },
    {
      "id": 2,
      "email": "gaifadmin@gaif.com",
      "fullName": "GAIF Admin",
      "mobile": "+962792222222",
      "role": "GAIF_ADMIN",
      "status": "APPROVED",
      "isActive": true,
      "mfaEnabled": false,
      "createdAt": "2024-01-02T00:00:00.000Z"
    }
  ],
  "pagination": {
    "page": 1,
    "limit": 10,
    "total": 2,
    "totalPages": 1
  }
}

request.description: Get user details by ID
Update user details - supports fullName, email, password, role, status, isActive. Email must be unique.
Delete user - soft delete
Approve a pending user and assign role
Update own password - any authenticated user
Get list of all countries

formdata.description: Any string value (e.g., MR, MRS, MS, DR, PROF, etc.)
Spouse data - title can be any string

request.description: Create a full registration with all data and files
Get full registration details by ID

response.name: Success
response.body:
{
  "id": 1,
  "profileId": 1,
  "title": "MR",
  "firstName": "John",
  "lastName": "Doe",
  "email": "john.doe@acme.com",
  "status": "SUBMITTED",

  "trips": [{"id": 1, "name": "Petra Day Trip"}],
  "ammanHotel": {"id": 1, "hotelName": "Grand Hyatt Amman"}
}

request.description: Admin update registration - supports ALL fields including status, participation, company, spouse, trips, accommodation, flights, transportation, visa, and payment status. Requires admin authentication.

response.name: Success
response.body:
{
  "result": {
    "id": 1,
    "profileId": 1001,
    "title": "DR",
    "firstName": "John Updated",
    "middleName": "William",
    "lastName": "Doe",
    "email": "john.updated@acme.com",
    "position": "Director",
    "registrationStatus": "CONFIRMED",
    "paymentStatus": "PAID",
    "hasSpouse": true,
    "company": {"id": 1, "name": "Acme Corporation"},
    "participation": {"id": 2, "title": "Standard Delegate"},
    "spouse": {"firstName": "Jane Updated", "lastName": "Doe"},
    "trips": [{"id": 1, "name": "Petra Day Trip"}]
  }
}

query.description: Search by first name, last name, email, or mobile

request.description: Get paginated list of registrations with filters, tokens, invoice data, and summary stats (Admin only)
Submit registration - calculates total price and changes status to SUBMITTED
Upload visa documents for a registration
Upload visa documents for spouse
Get confirmed registrations for roommate selection
Check if WhatsApp number is already registered
Company confirms participant registration via secure token (from email)
Company declines participant registration via secure token (from email)
View registration details via secure token (public access)

View a file (participant picture, passport, residency, visa form, or spouse documents) using the same view-registration token. The file must belong to the registration associated with the token. Returns the file binary content inline.

response.name: Forbidden
